Package entropy.configuration

This package contains the different elements that model a configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration  
    ManagedElement
    A element managed by Entropy.
    ManagedElementSet<E extends ManagedElement>
    Specify a list of managed elements without duplicated elements.
    Node
    Interface to specify a working node.
    StateDefinition
    specify running states of Nodes and VirtualMachines
    VirtualMachine
    Specify a Virtual Machine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationTools  
    ManagedElementSets
    Various tools extracting datas from ManagedElementSet.
    MockManagedElement
    Mock for testing ManagedElement.
    ResourcePicker
    A tool to retrieve a resource from a virtual machine or a node using an identifier.
    VirtualMachineComparator
    A compator for virtual machines.
    VirtualMachinesSetComparator
    Compare two set of virtual machines by summing some resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ResourcePicker.NodeRc
    The resources of a node.
    ResourcePicker.VMRc
    The resources of a virtual machine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationsException  

Package entropy.configuration Description

This package contains the different elements that model a configuration.
